description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Manage key accounts; build up special caring program to strengthen, seeking and take care contractor and consultant
              
              - Build up relationship with consultant to do spec-in
              
              - Build up relationship with contractor to secure Projects
              
              - Follow up customers in term of payment (Account Receivable), Project delivery plan, Project approaching, bidding, and contract
              
              - Market development: expand sales network and new customers (contractors, consultants and developers)
              
              - Report sales progress and result frequently: daily, weekly, monthly
              
              - Keep tracking on market movement and competitors’ activities and information
              
              - Keep tracking on moving consensus for project delivery plan and updating project information
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Bachelor of University of Technology or economics field
              
              - Experienced in sales projects – at least 1 year experiences
              
              - Good communication skills
              
              - Good at English (>500 score of TOEIC)
              
              - Good at negotiation skill
              
              - Sales oriented, drive for results and good interpersonal skill
              
              - Work well under pressure and independently
              
              - Well on job organizing, planning and critical thinking
              
              - Good at office computer skills
              
              - Hard-working, dynamic, high sense of responsibility and open-minded
              
              - Teamwork, disciplined working spirits
              
              - Willing to learn, adapt and to be flexible in new environment/or situation
              
              - To be able to go on business trip
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
